src:
【江峰時刻】《川普對決中國》：方偉採訪美國重量級政治人物金里奇（gingrich）中國夢的實現就是美國夢的終結

01 Nov 2019, 19:42

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月02日訊】《川普對決中國》：方偉採訪美國重量級政治人物金里奇（gingrich）中國夢的實現就是美國夢的終結（江峰會客室20191101第2期）



本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/01/a102698247.html
text:
[Jiangfeng Moment] "Troppu vs. China": Fang Wei interviews American heavyweight politician Gingrich's realization of Chinese dream is the end of American dream

01 Nov 2019, 19:42

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 02, 2019] "Troppu vs. China": Fang Wei interviews American heavyweight politician Gingrich The realization of the Chinese dream is the end of the American dream (Jiangfeng Meeting Room 20191101, Issue 2 )
